casebody.data:
In the Matter of E. C. DENTON STORES, Bankrupt. Circuit Court of Appeals, Sixth Circuit. June 29, 1938. For opinion below, see 5 F.Supp. 307. Froome Morris and Peck, Shaffer & Williams, all of Cincinnati, Ohio, and Esta-brook, Finn & McKee, of Dayton, Ohio, for appellant. Pogue, Hoffheiiner & Pogue, of Cincinnati, Ohio, and Martin & Corry, of Springfield, Ohio, for appellee.

Before HICKS, ALLEN, and HAMILTON, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

It appearing to the court that an appeal was allowed in this case on March 14, 1934, and that no further steps have been taken to prosecute the appeal, it is ordered that the appeal be dismissed.
